tracks.text: Players walk around the dirt roads of a European-style village. Some gawk at a large knight. Text, Starting Town, Firstia
The knight looks around. Text appears above characters, Sugar, Orga, Kit, Hades, Jaffrey, Ninto, Lily, Bolbol, Kalbo, Meina, Breo.
In a traditional Japanese-style house in wooded suburbia, a bamboo souzu water fountain gurgles in a garden.
In a bedroom, Rei sits up from her futon on the floor. The traditional Japanese room is 8 tatami mats large. It includes a low floor table, and translucent paper walls.
She takes off her VR goggles and shakes her head.
Muscular legs walk forward. Twin green blades dangle to side. The thighs bear large, dark scars.
Muscular arms and abs also bear scars.
Sunraku wears only blue shorts and a blue bird mask.
Red text appears, Shangri-La Frontier. Beyond the text is an expanse of mountains, forests, plains, and cities. We zoom out and the expanse is reflected in VR goggles worn by Rakuro
At night, Sunraku stands in a misty field
Moon light shines over Sunraku as he stands near large rocks.
Rakuro smiles. His image glitches into Sunraku, whose brow furrows
A woman with long purple hair twirls a spear in a forest.
A girl with blond pig tails walks forward. Looking away from us, she puts her hands on her hips.
A large knight wears a helmet. A rabbit wears a suit and top hat. The rabbit leaps and is replaced by a girl in a suit and top hat.
A large rabbit with an eye patch sits cross legged in a low lit, traditional Japanese room
A man wearing armor and a purple cape sits on a box in a storage room.
The dark figure of a wolf bearing fangs appears over a forest and a red moon. White lines shine around the wolf's orange, glowing eyes.
Sunraku runs through the woods. He leaps, and crosses in front of a full moon.
Flying through the air, he kicks and punches goblins. Holding red twin knives, he cuts at more goblins.
With red glowing fists, the blond girl fires energy blasts at goblins. The purple haired woman strikes human sized wasps. They fight back to back.
The large rabbit, with a scar over his right eye, slowly opens his eyes.
The purple haired girl strikes with a sword. The blond girl punches with a fire ball.
The knight strikes the ground, and the ground explodes with brilliant light that fades to lightning.
A town of small red houses and rabbit shaped motifs. A large red castle rests at the top of a giant tree.
The town fades into Sunraku's red eye
The rabbit leaps up, smiling.
In a forest glowing with a red mist, the blond girl, Sunraku, and purple haired girl walk side by side.
A bridge spans a misty chasm. A snake and a man are on the east side. Text, 2, A Peculiar One
Red labels, Ravenous Python, Area Boss
Python moves its head side to side. It's green, and its head is as large as a man.
He equips twin blades and runs towards Python.
The snake lunges. Sunraku leaps towards Python, then dodges.
He lands. Python turns to look at Sunraku and flicks out its tongue
Sunraku's calves glow. Blue dialog, Tap Step, adds a bonus to evasion.
Python rears its head, bears its fangs, and lunges
Python snaps, Sunraku dodges. Repeat.
Sunraku leaps back after the 6th dodge
He flanks Python, who turns to face him. Python lunges, Sunraku moves to the right, running along Pythons body. He strikes.
Blade breaks
Python coils and rises up
He equips shiny red twin blades.
Python roars and strikes with its tail. Sunraku leaps in the air.
Python points the end of its tail and Sunraku, and shoots a stream of viscous purple fluid in Sunraku's face.
Sunraku lands on the ground. Python moves side to side.
The purple disappears. Red dialog, Status effect, Poison, Take damage every 10 seconds
Sunraku's HP, 29/30
Python looks down, flicking its tongue
Sunraku leaps. Python bites. Blades hit fangs.
Sunraku lands. Python stares. HP 19.
Python lunges, Sunraku side steps, jumps over the tail, turns, and dives towards a scale.
Python rears its head and begins to thrash. Sunraku keeps the blade dug between 2 scales and holds on.
Red pixels float from the wound. Sunraku strikes the wound. On every strike, Red text appears, Critical
Python knocks Sunraku away with its tail
The wound closes up
Darkness
A leg peaks out of Python's mouth
Sunraku's eye glistens.
He forces opens Python's mouth, strikes, then leaps high
He strikes Python's forehead.
Sunraku unequips a blade, then holds onto Python's mane.
He strikes Python's eye. Light and red pixels explode out of the head as Python screams.
Sunraku falls to the ground as Python disintegrates into a rainbow of pixels that float away, shimmer, and disappear
Text, Level Up, 12 arrow 14
Labels. Dropped Item, Python Scale. Dropped Item, Python White Hair
HP 9
A medieval wall made of brick, topped with crenellations. A man and woman stand before an archway.
Sunraku runs towards them
Mia equips a bow and arrow
Pink and bubbly aura for normal name. Bloody aura with skull.
Reiji blushes
He rushes into the room and dives into bed as the sun sets.
HP 1
HP 0. Darkness.
Red dialog. Death penalty. All stats temporarily reduced.
Rakuro lies in bed.
He sits up and takes off his VR helmet.
The crenellated wall. Text, Town Before the Swamp, Secondale
Players walk around the stone streets and sidewalks between Tudor-style buildings. Sunraku passes a bar and a florist.
Armor Shop. He equips a skin-tight green top and pants.
Green leather ski mask
Weapons shop
Iron dagger, Wood staff, Stone staff, Fossil Rod, Wood Shield.
He hits a rock with a pickaxe. A piece falls off. Label, Stone, A completely unremarkable piece of rock.
A pile of stones settle
2 gray ore
Gray ore
Red label, Mud Frog. It protects itself with a coating of mud.
The frog is the same green as Sunraku's clothes. It splashes in the mud near Sunraku, getting him muddy.
He throws the pickaxe at the mud frog, who falls over
He slowly wades over to the frog
He raises his axe. Red pixels float away.
Label, Dropped Item, Mud Frog Skin
Weapons shop. A dozen gray ore and a green rock
Marsh dagger
Street sign. Weapon Shop Avenue, Item Shop Avenue
One merchant holds maps. Another merchant holds a bottle.
Marsh Daggers. After landing a critical, reductions to durability are temporarily halved.
Python by the bridge
The knight decapitates Python
Clouds approach the bright, full moon.
Above craggy outcroppings, the clouds extinguish the moonlight.
Sunraku fights a goblin with an axe and a red hat.
The goblin strikes. Sunraku parries, forming an X with his Marsh Daggers.
Goblin jumps back.
Red label, Redcap Goblin
Goblin throws his head back
More redcap goblins emerge from the outcroppings
In bed, Rakuro smiles. In SLF, 5 goblins attack at once
Sunraku side steps and dodges attacks from in front and sides
A blinding flash explodes in his face.
The goblins dissintegrate
A giant wolf with orange eyes and a purple crackling aura
The clouds part. The wolf stares down at Sunraku, her eyes the size of a man. Her black fur has white flashes in the shapes of lightning bolts from her jaw to her eyes
She breaths, sending a shockwave across the ground.
She roars
A skyscraper towers over an urban area. Clouds drift over a full moon.
A long line of servers glitter

A dashboard of charts displays on a computer on a desk in front of an empty chair. The furniture sits in a large, otherwise vacant room. Bars of glowing blue lights line the floor of the office. The computer desktop has a matching striped glow.
A window pops up. Shangri-La Frontier, World Story, Unique Monsters Dispatched: 0, Progress: 0%.
Rakuro floats, as if in water. Debris floats around him.
He reaches out a hand. The debris glitters.
He opens his blue eyes. He has short, spiky blue hair.
Pixels float in cyberspace. We follow a tunnel of light
Grass blows before an orange sunset.
Sunraku, covered in scars, stands.
Rei opens her brown eyes. She has short brown hair that wraps around her face.
Sunraku walks on a path with a white bunny wearing a coat and top hat. The rabbit twirls and does a back flip.
Surrounded by stone columns, the knight appears. Her armor is white and lined in gold. Her helmet bears a long, red plume.
A woman with long purple hair looks determined. Her hair moves gently in the wind.
A blond woman looks up. She has shoulder length hair tied up in pig tails.
Sunraku stares up as clouds roll over a blue sky. It glows yellow with a sunset, then darkens to a dark purple moon.
His bird mask feathers blows in the wiind.
The purple haired woman stands on a cliff in front of the moon, her hands on her hips.
The blond woman crouches on an outcropping, in front of the moon
Sunraku and the knight stand, facing opposite directions, surrounded by floating debris, backdropped by a nebula that glows prismatically from red to green to blue.
Blue pixels float in cyberspace as we fly through a tunnel of light
Fade to Black
Elementary students sit in front of a stage. Sunraku pushes the word SLF Mini
Text, 3, Bird Frog Ensemble
Sunraku mines. Frog watches.
Text, 4, The Extremely Conspicuous Big Brawny White Figure
The middle of Firstia town. The knight doesn't move.
More and more players gather around the knight, who is heads taller than the rest of them. The players wear simple clothing.
